paragraphs: The 6500B series Precision Impedance Analyzers deliver unparalleled precision in component testing, with a frequency range up to 120 MHz. They stand out in the market with a basic measurement accuracy of ±0.05%, making them the premier choice for applications in passive component design, dielectric material characterization, and manufacturing tests. The series is designed to meet the needs of engineers requiring high-frequency component evaluations with exceptional accuracy.

features.title: High Precision Measurements
features.description: Characterize components with supreme accuracy across a wide frequency range from 20 MHz to 120 MHz, ensuring detailed analysis and quality assurance

features.title: Versatile Measurement Options
features.description: Capacitance, inductance, and impedance measurements feature a basic accuracy of ±0.05%. Additional accuracy includes dissipation factor accuracy of ±0.0005 and quality factor accuracy of ±0.05%

features.title: Graphical Sweep Capabilities
features.description: Perform graphical sweeps of two measured parameters across frequency, drive level, and DC bias, displayed on a large, clear color screen. Available display formats include series or parallel equivalent circuit models

features.title: Advanced Analysis Tools
features.description: Equipped with Equivalent Circuit Analysis for modeling and curve fitting, alongside traditional LCR Meter mode for straightforward measurements. Features include resonance search and the option for polar and complex plots

features.title: Ease of Use
features.description: A large TFT touch screen offers an intuitive user interface, simplifying complex measurements and data analysis

features.title: Connectivity and Control
features.description: Fully programmable via GPIB and LAN interfaces, with options for keyboard and mouse controls. External monitor or projector connections are available for large screen displays, enhancing visibility in production or educational settings

features.title: Data Management
features.description: Efficiently store and retrieve measurement and setup data through Ethernet or USB flash memory. Supports up to 20 local storage setups for each mode

features.title: Safety Features
features.description: Integrated protection against charged capacitors to prevent damage and ensure longevity

features.title: Additional Options
features.description: Variable AC drive levels up to 1Vrms or 20mArms, DC bias options ranging from 0 to +40V, and bin handling for quality control processes

specifications.heading: Measurement Functions
content: Capacitance (C), Inductance (L), Resistance (R), Reactance (X), Conductance (G), Susceptance (B)

specifications.heading: Measurement Speeds
content: Up to 20 measurements per second for test frequencies ≥100 Hz

specifications.heading: Accuracy
specifications.note: Accuracy depend on frequency, drive level and impedance

specifications.heading: DC Bias Current (Option)
content: /D1 0 to +100mA dc bias current and 0 to +40V dc bias voltage

specifications.heading: Binning (Option)
content: 10 bins with absolute and percentage limits
list: /B1 (Non-isolated) Common 0V Bin outputs 0 to 5V (normal) with >10mA current sink capability
/B2 (isolated) Common 24V input outputs 0 to 24V with >10mA current source capability

specifications.heading: Input Specification
content: Power supply - Input voltage 90 V AC to 264 V AC (Autoranging)

specifications.heading: Display
content: 8.4" VGA (640 x 480) color TFT with touch panel

specifications.heading: Measurement Connections
content: Four front panel BNC connectors permit two, three or four terminal connections with the screens at ground potential
1J1011 Component Fixture (supplied as standard) allows connection to leaded components and devices

specifications.heading: Printer
content: HP-PCL compatible graphics printing (local and network)
Centronics / parallel printer port, Epson compatible text/ticket printing (local)

specifications.heading: Remote Trigger
content: Rear panel BNC with internal pull-up, operates on logic low or contact closure

specifications.heading: GPIB Interface
content: External instrument control 24 pin IEEE 488 connector

specifications.heading: VGA Interface
content: 15-way D-type connector to drive an external monitor in addition to the internal screen

specifications.heading: Keyboard Interface
content: Standard USB or PS/2 keyboard port. Instrument front panel remains active with keyboard plugged in

specifications.heading: Mouse Interface
content: Standard USB or PS/2 mouse port
Touch screen remains enabled when the mouse is connected
